name: LOOP NOIR
description:
LOOP NOIR turned out to be a little proof of concept. We had a clear vision of a small looped puzzle game with a murder scene and a conspiracy, but all we finished is 3 rooms. Room 3 is the last in the demo and it couldn't be finished.

Use FULLSCREEN for a better experience

CONTROLS:
WASD + Mouse
E or LMB to USE
TAB to exit computer
ESC to show/hide menu on the current computer

In case of poor performance consider downloading the windows version below
